scripts.create-venv: node -p "process.platform === 'win32' ? 'python -m venv venv > nul 2>&1 && echo Python virtual environment created' : 'python3 -m venv venv > /dev/null 2>&1'"
scripts.generate-requirements: node -p "process.platform === 'win32' ? 'venv\\Scripts\\pip freeze > requirements.txt > nul 2>&1' : 'venv/bin/pip freeze > requirements.txt > /dev/null 2>&1'"
scripts.install-python: node -p "process.platform === 'win32' ? 'venv\\Scripts\\pip install -r requirements.txt > nul 2>&1' : 'venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt > /dev/null 2>&1'"
scripts.start-python: node -e "require('child_process').execSync(process.platform === 'win32' ? 'venv\\Scripts\\python -m uvicorn main:app --reload' : 'venv/bin/python -m uvicorn main:app --reload', { stdio: 'inherit' })"
scripts.postinstall: npm run create-venv && npm run install-python && npm run generate-requirements
